content: corresponding with bottom insert hook in loop wind thread around left prong of hairpin loom yo fig 3 draw through loop keeping work centred fig 4 yo and pull through loop fig 5 remove loop from hook make 1/2 turn to the right fig 6 reinsert hook in dropped loop yo and pull through loop fig 7 insert hook through loop formed on right prong fig 8 yo and pull through 2 loops on hook fig 9 yo and pull through both loops completing the single_crochet repeat from fig 5 to 9 for desired length of 48 loops on both prongs hairpin lace left handed tutorial lesson 2 pull up loop to measure 7 inches and cut remove ball thread remove lace from loom bring ends together thread tapestry needle with one end of thread insert needle in first two center stitches on other end of hairpin lace pull thread through stitches and insert needle in first two center stitches on other end of hairpin lace and pull through stitches weave in end along the center stitches weave in next thread end the same way hairpin lace left handed tutorial lesson 3 round 01 chain 5 slip_stitch in first chain st to form ring chain 1 12 single_crochet in chain 5 space slip_stitch in first single_crochet round 02 chain 1 single_crochet in join chain 1 single_crochet in first 4 loops on inside ring of hairpin lace * chain 1 single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in next 4 loops of hairpin lace around chain 1 single_crochet in first single_crochet fasten_off round 03 working on outer edge of hairpin lace attach thread to any loop of hairpin lace chain 1 single_crochet in same loop * chain 2 single_crochet in next loop around chain 1 single_crochet in first single_crochet round 04 chain 1 single_crochet in join * chain 3 single_crochet in next chain 2 space around chain 1 half_double_crochet in first single_crochet round 05 to 08 chain 1 single_crochet in join * chain 3 single_crochet in next chain 3 space around chain 1 half_double_crochet in first single_crochet round 09 chain 1 * yo insert hook in chain 3 space yo and pull up 5 times yo and pull through all loops on hook puff st chain 4 slip_stitch in first chain st around sl st in first puff st fasten_off
